paper.title: Verification of an Implementation of Tomasulo's Algorithm by Compositional Model Checking
paper.abstract: An implementation of an out-of-order processing unit based on Tomasulou0027s algorithm is formally verified using compositional model checking techniques. This demonstrates that finite-state methods can be applied to such algorithms, without recourse to higher-order proof systems. The paper introduces a novel compositional system that supports cyclic environment reasoning and multiple environment abstractions per signal. A proof of Tomasulou0027s algorithm is outlined, based on refinement maps, and relying on the novel features of the compositional system. This proof is fully verified by the SMV verifier, using symmetry to reduce the number of assertions that must be verified.
